description: The application is only in light mode despite the screenshots of it being in dark mode. My gnome theme is set to dark mode everwhere and there is no settings/preferences within the app to fix it.
unfourtenatly only light mode. Does not integrate well with Gnome Desktop
I tried logging in to Lemoa, but I repeatedly receive the error: "error decoding response body: input is not enough for unique dqate and time at line 1 column 1148". :(
L'application fonctionne, il faut se l'admettre, mais elle est lente, les images chargent très lentement, et cliquer sur les postes est lent également
